content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 43, "index": 20}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 32, "index": 42}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a crimson trapdoor, I need to place 3x3 crimson planks in the crafting grid. I will first move 1 plank from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 43, "index": 20}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 35}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 32, "index": 42}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed 1 plank in slot 1, now I need to place the next plank in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 43, "index": 20}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 32, "index": 42}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed 2 planks in slots 1 and 2, now I need to place the next plank in slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 43, "index": 20}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 32, "index": 42}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed 3 planks in slots 1, 2, and 3, now I need to place the next plank in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 43, "index": 20}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 32, "index": 42}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed 4 planks in slots 1, 2, 3, and 4, now I need to place the next plank in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 5 with quantity 1

thought: I have placed 5 planks in slots 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5, now I need to place the next plank in slot 6.
Ok

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_trapdoor", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "debug_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 43, "index": 20}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 8, "index": 34}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 32, "index": 42}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the crimson trapdoor by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
